languages.text: "В отсеке есть знахари, практикующие суеверные методы целительства, признанные учеными лекарями в лучшем случае бесполезными. Сейчас блюстители запрещают этим шарлатанам лечить людей, но... Если разрешить их глупые снадобья, проблема дефицита лекарств встанет менее остро". {n}Капитан замолкает, удивленный собственной смелостью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "В отсеке есть знахари, практикующие суеверные методы целительства, признанные техножрецами в лучшем случае бесполезными. Сейчас блюстители запрещают этим шарлатанам лечить людей, но... Если разрешить их глупые снадобья, проблема дефицита лекарств встанет менее остро". {n}Капитан замолкает, удивленный собственной смелостью.{/n}

languages.text: "We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В отсеке есть знахари, практикующие суеверные методы целительства, признанные учеными лекарями в лучшем случае бесполезными. Сейчас блюстители запрещают этим шарлатанам лечить людей, но... Если разрешить их глупые снадобья, проблема дефицита лекарств встанет менее остро". {n}Капитан замолкает, удивленный собственной смелостью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We have faith healers in this bay who practice superstition-based medicine that Tech-Priests have deemed to be useless at best. Right now, enforcers forbid these quacks from healing people but... Lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, looking surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

{n}The captain speaks fast, elated by your approval.{/n} "We have faith healers in this bay who practice superstition-based medicine that Tech-Priests have deemed to be useless at best. Right now, enforcers forbid these quacks from healing people but... Lifting the ban on their silly potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage."

"We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that Tech-Priests have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

{n}The captain speaks fast, elated by your approval.{/n} "We have faith healers in this bay who practice superstition-based medicine that Tech-Priests have deemed to be useless at best. Right now, enforcers forbid these quacks from healing people but... Lifting the ban on their silly potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage."

Lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, looking surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

"We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

languages.text: "Wir haben in diesem Modul Glaubensheiler, die auf Aberglauben basierende Medikamente verabreichen, die die ausgebildete Spezialisten bestenfalls als nutzlos betrachten. Im Moment verbieten die Enforcer diesen Quacksalbern, Leute zu behandeln, aber ... eine Aufhebung des Verbots ihrer absurden Tränke würde den medizinischen Engpass etwas entschärfen." {n}Er hält sichtlich überrascht von seiner eigenen Kühnheit inne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben in diesem Modul Glaubensheiler, die auf Aberglauben basierende Medikamente verabreichen, die die ausgebildete Spezialisten bestenfalls als nutzlos betrachten. Im Moment verbieten die Enforcer diesen Quacksalbern, Leute zu behandeln, aber ... eine Aufhebung des Verbots ihrer absurden Tränke würde den medizinischen Engpass etwas entschärfen." {n}Er hält sichtlich überrascht von seiner eigenen Kühnheit inne.{/n}

{n}Der Captain spricht schnell und ist von deiner Zustimmung ermutigt.{/n} "Wir haben in diesem Modul Glaubensheiler, die auf Aberglauben basierende Medikamente verabreichen, die die Techpriester bestenfalls als nutzlos betrachten. Im Moment verbieten Enforcer diesen Quacksalbern das Heilen, aber ... Das Verbot ihrer absurden Tränke zu lockern, würde den medizinischen Engpass etwas entschärfen."

languages.text: « Cette baie abrite des rebouteux qui pratiquent une médecine empreinte de superstition considérée au mieux comme inefficace par les spécialistes en la matière. Les prévôts interdisent actuellement à ces charlatans de soigner les gens, mais... lever l'interdiction de leurs potions loufoques pourrait compenser quelque peu la pénurie de médicaments. » {n}Il s'interrompt, apparemment surpris par sa propre audace.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette baie abrite des rebouteux qui pratiquent une médecine empreinte de superstition considérée au mieux comme inefficace par les spécialistes en la matière. Les prévôts interdisent actuellement à ces charlatans de soigner les gens, mais... lever l'interdiction de leurs potions loufoques pourrait compenser quelque peu la pénurie de médicaments. » {n}Il s'interrompt, apparemment surpris par sa propre audace.{/n}

{n}Le capitaine s'emballe, transporté par votre approbation.{/n} « Cette baie abrite des rebouteux qui pratiquent une médecine empreinte de superstition considérée au mieux comme inefficace par les technoprêtres. Les prévôts interdisent actuellement à ces charlatans de soigner les gens, mais... lever l'interdiction de leurs potions loufoques pourrait compenser quelque peu la pénurie de médicaments. »

languages.text: «Tenemos curanderos que practican una medicina de naturaleza supersticiosa; los especialistas creen que, en el mejor de los casos, se trata de una práctica inofensiva. De momento los guardias les tienen prohibido tratar a la gente, pero... si levantamos la prohibición de sus absurdas pócimas, tal vez compensemos la escasez de medicamentos». {n}El capitán hace una pausa, aparentemente sorprendido por su propio atrevimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Tenemos curanderos que practican una medicina de naturaleza supersticiosa; los especialistas creen que, en el mejor de los casos, se trata de una práctica inofensiva. De momento los guardias les tienen prohibido tratar a la gente, pero... si levantamos la prohibición de sus absurdas pócimas, tal vez compensemos la escasez de medicamentos». {n}El capitán hace una pausa, aparentemente sorprendido por su propio atrevimiento.{/n}

{n}El capitán habla deprisa, entusiasmado con tu aprobación.{/n} «Tenemos curanderos que practican una medicina de naturaleza supersticiosa; los tecnosacerdotes creen que, en el mejor de los casos, se trata de una práctica inútil. Los guardias les tienen prohibido tratar a la gente, pero... Si levantamos la prohibición de sus absurdas pócimas, tal vez compensemos la escasez de medicamentos».

languages.text: 「このベイには、迷信に基づいた医療を行う信仰療法士がいるのですが、知識を持つ専門家はどうあがいても役に立たないと判じています。現在、エンフォーサーはこういった藪医者が人民を治療することを禁じていますが…連中の馬鹿げた薬を解禁すれば、薬不足は幾分か緩和されるでしょう」{n}彼は自分の大胆な言葉に驚いたかのように言葉を止めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「このベイには、迷信に基づいた医療を行う信仰療法士がいるのですが、知識を持つ専門家はどうあがいても役に立たないと判じています。現在、エンフォーサーはこういった藪医者が人民を治療することを禁じていますが…連中の馬鹿げた薬を解禁すれば、薬不足は幾分か緩和されるでしょう」{n}彼は自分の大胆な言葉に驚いたかのように言葉を止めた。{/n}
{n}中隊長は、あなたの承認に意気揚々と早口で話す。{/n}「このベイには、迷信に基づいた医療を行う信仰療法士がいるのですが、技術司祭はどうあがいても役に立たないと判じています。現在、エンフォーサーはこういった藪医者が人民を治療することを禁じていますが…連中の馬鹿げた薬を解禁すれば、薬不足は幾分か緩和されるでしょう」

languages.text: “这片甲板上有一群神棍，他们会使用迷信的手段治疗病人。根据那些技术人员的说法，他们的药物只要不把人吃坏，就已经相当难得了。目前，执法者禁止那些庸医到处乱治病，不过……如果能解除禁令，允许他们用荒诞不经的药剂治病的话，可以在一定程度上缓解药物短缺的问题。”{n}他停了下来，显然被自己大胆的言论惊呆了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We have faith healers in this bay practising superstition-based medicine that learned specialists have deemed to be useless at best. At present, enforcers are forbidding these quacks from healing people, but... lifting the ban on their absurd potions would somewhat alleviate the medicine shortage." {n}He stops, apparently surprised by his own boldness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这片甲板上有一群神棍，他们会使用迷信的手段治疗病人。根据那些技术人员的说法，他们的药物只要不把人吃坏，就已经相当难得了。目前，执法者禁止那些庸医到处乱治病，不过……如果能解除禁令，允许他们用荒诞不经的药剂治病的话，可以在一定程度上缓解药物短缺的问题。”{n}他停了下来，显然被自己大胆的言论惊呆了。{/n}
{n}由于得到了你的赞同，上尉看起来兴高采烈，语速也变得更快了。{/n}“这片甲板上有一群神棍，他们会使用迷信疗法进行治疗。根据技术神甫的说法，他们的药物只要不把人吃坏，就已经相当难得了。目前，执法者禁止这些庸医到处治病，不过……如果能解除禁令，允许他们用荒唐不经的药剂来治病的话，可以在一定程度上缓解药物短缺的问题。”
